Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball hit an even deeper three a few minutes after his first shot.
Ball made a beautiful cut to hit a reverse layup.
Ball made one of his signature off-ball rotations to force a steal, and then leap into the sidelines to save the ball.
Post-Match Reflections: The Bulls gave Ball the game ball after his preseason return. What a cathartic moment for the player and the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls are still very much half-finished with their teardown.
The team that was the No. 1 seed in the East with Ball in 2022 was summarily dismissed without him in a five-game first round series to the Bucks.
Lonzo Ball is broken, and the Bulls are, too
Basketball has never seen a player like Lonzo Ball
Others: Lonzo Ball couldn't walk up a flight of stairs after his knee injuries.
Ball was diagnosed with a bone bruise under his knee, had to have his meniscus fully replaced, and eventually had to get a rare cartilage transplant.
